article.title: Barco to Provide Shipboard Air Traffic Control Technologies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Barco Incorporated, Duluth, Georgia, is being awarded an $8,585,560 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of commercial items in support of the AN/TPX-42A(V) Shipboard Air Traffic Control System. Items to be procured include flat panel displays with mounting hardware; interface boards with digital video interface (DVI); flat panel displays with DVI; back light assembly with cathode fluorescent; and mini display port keyboard with maintenance keyboard. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
